original_text: And when they had sent away the multitude, they took him even as he was in the ship. And there were also with him other little ships.
korean_text: 그들이 무리를 떠나 예수를 배에 계신 그대로 모시고 가매 다른 배들도 함께 하더니

sentences.original_text: And when they had sent away the multitude
they took him even as he was in the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 배에 있는 그대로 그를 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: And there were also with him other little ships
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 다른 작은 배들도 있었습니다
